title: An Act providing for alternate members of the conservation commission of the town of Becket

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Davis of Great Barrington and Senator Mark, a joint petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3977) of Leigh Davis (by vote of the town) that the town of Becket be authorized to provide for alternate members of the conservation commission of said town.  Municipalities and Regional Government.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 05/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

actions.description: Committee reported that the matter be placed in the Orders of the Day for the next sitting for a second reading
Read second and ordered to a third reading
Read third and passed to be engrossed
Read, rules suspended, read second and ordered to a third reading
